name: Cartoon Sea World: Hungry Fish Premium
name_original: Cartoon Sea World: Hungry Fish Premium
description:
Control the shark to eat kinds of fish. Explore the world of fish in the sea.

Highlights:
•Cute fish
•Addictive gameplay, easy and fun
•Tilt phone to move
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center Support
